lead_paragraph: An Alabama drive-in theater won't show a new re-telling of the classic fairy tale "Beauty and the Beast" because one of its characters is portrayed as homosexual.
snippet: An Alabama drive-in theater won't show a new re-telling of the classic fairy tale "Beauty and the Beast" because one of its characters is portrayed as homosexual....

headline.main: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
headline.print_headline: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
